mapper.select: SELECT pro.PRODUCT_IMAGE, pay.PAYMENT_DATE, pp.PAYMENT_PRODUCT_NO, pro.PRODUCT_NAME, b.BASKET_COUNT, pay.PAYMENT_PRICE, pay.PAYMENT_TYPE, c.CARD_COMPANY_NAME FROM PAYMENT_PRODUCT pp JOIN PAYMENT pay ON pp.PAYMENT_PRODUCT_PAYMENT_NO = pay.PAYMENT_NO JOIN BASKET b ON pp.PAYMENT_PRODUCT_BASKET_NO = b.BASKET_NO JOIN PRODUCT pro ON b.BASKET_PRODUCT_NO = pro.PRODUCT_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON b.BASKET_MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID JOIN CARD c ON pay.PAYMENT_CARD_NO = c.CARD_NO WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
